capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by Harry's story. He's truly the boy who lived, and it's amazing to think about all he went through at Hogwarts. I mean, can you imagine being famous in the wizarding world from birth just because of your parents' deaths? It's a lot to handle, especially when you're still trying to figure out who you are.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to someone about Harry Potter and they mentioned that he's really good at catching things. I completely agree with that, I think it's true that Harry has a talent for chasing down those pesky quidditch balls.
